business_definition: Transaction category balance record structure containing account identification and balance information (RECLN = 50)
Composite key identifying a unique transaction category balance record by account ID, transaction type code, and category code
Account identification number associated with the transaction category
Transaction type code identifying the category of transaction
Transaction category code providing detailed classification of the transaction
Transaction category balance amount with two decimal places
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
